title: Emerald & Diamond Grand Haaram - PMQN9
materials: 18K White Gold. Features meticulously selected square-cut Emeralds with vivid green hue and high clarity. Adorned with sparkling GH color diamonds
in a pave setting. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting brilliance.
features: This grand Haaram features a floral-inspired design, with emeralds elegantly interspersed within diamond-studded 'flowers'. The intricate diamond pave setting enhances the brilliance of each stone. The design is a modern interpretation of traditional South Indian jewelry, blending classic gemstone combinations with contemporary styling.
colors: with subtle golden hues from the 18K white gold.
occasions: and significant celebrations. Its elegance also suits upscale galas and formal events.
description: A statement piece that combines classic elegance with modern design. The high-quality emeralds and brilliant diamonds ensure lasting value and a captivating sparkle. The Hyderabadi polish adds to the piece's durability and lustrous finish. It's a heirloom-worthy investment that embodies both tradition and sophistication.
